subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Yasmani Tomas, a 24-year-old outfielder who defected from Cuba last summer, has signed a six-year contract with the Arizona Diamondbacks, according to multiple reports.
snippet: Yasmani Tomas, a 24-year-old outfielder who defected from Cuba last summer, has signed a six-year contract with the Arizona Diamondbacks, according to multiple reports.
